Name: ShootOut(SystemD)
About the game: 22nd century, there are still remains from the 21st and even from the 20th. But the 22nd century came with its own Revolution: Interstellar travels. Humankind is now in the process of colonizing a whole new world. You're a Space Privateer. Doing the dirty job for big corporations. Find and rescue civilians. If they survive, they will improve and serve you as backfire or healer. Manage your team in your Headquarter, then decide your next mission. Choose your arsenal: Pistols, Revolvers, Assault Rifles, ShotGuns, Sniper Rifles, Syringe Guns, Sub-Machine Guns, Plasma Rifles, Grenades, Drones... You'll find the combo fitting your style and the situation! Main Features Countless procedurally generated levels Squad system Vicious AI Cute Cel Shaded grafics
